attributes.action: Bring our boys back home safely, Please
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is heartbreaking to watch families lose there children in a war that is never ending and that we cannot win, why do we have to keep losing our good british troops, noone could ever imagine the pain felt by losing someone in this way, please bring them back before anymore families are torn apart by losing there children

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
